info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 21 at 4:36AM MDT until July 21 at 6:30AM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of New Mexico, including the following counties, Dona Ana and Luna and western Texas, including the following county, El Paso.
* WHEN...Until 630 AM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Some low-water crossings may become impassable.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 436 AM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall of up to 0.5 to 1 inch is expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Santa Teresa, Sunland Park, La Union and Union Pacific Intermodal Terminal. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM MDT THIS MORNING

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Luna, NM; El Paso, TX
